tool_input.description: Format questions with agent and numbering

tool_response.stdout:
1	documentation-writer: Should each lesson include video content or is written documentation with code examples sufficient?
     2	python-developer: What Python version range should be supported (3.10+, 3.11+, 3.12+)?
     3	test-automation: Should integration tests run against live Anthropic API or always use mocks?
     4	architect-reviewer: Should the learning journey support multiple learning paths (beginner, intermediate, advanced)?
